availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Renaker (Harrison County, Ky, resident )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Jacob Renaker and Frances Renaker. Married to Nancy J. Musselman Renaker in Harrison County, Kentucky, on May 15, 1851. Father of James W. Renaker. Married to Sarah L. Minteer Renaker in Harrison County on May 31, 1855. Father of Mary F. Renaker and Joseph Renaker. Resident in Harrison County in 1850. Household owned seventeen enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1850.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216896.
